snippet: Improvised explosive devices and the bodies of six men who had been shot were found in the Stavropol area, stirring new worries about terrorism ahead of the Olympic Games planned for nearby Sochi.
abstract: Discovery of several explosive devices and bodies of six men puts security forces on high alert in North Caucasus region of Russia; also raises new concerns about violence ahead of upcoming Olympic Games in nearby resort city of Sochi.
lead_paragraph: Improvised explosive devices and the bodies of six men who had been shot were found in the Stavropol area, stirring new worries about terrorism ahead of the Olympic Games planned for nearby Sochi.

headline.main: Discovery of Bombs and Corpses Rattles Tense Caucasus Region
headline.print_headline: Russia: Discovery of Bodies and Bombs Heightens Concerns in North Caucasus
